page.title: 20HARTHILL IN THE FUTURE
page.content: I think Harthill will have a{Leisure} {Centre}in Spens Field instead of building houses.{The ponds}should be an ice-skating rink. There should be a fair on the top field that stays there all the time.{Harthill F.C.}could turn pro and go up into Division 1 and have some stands. The{cricket pitch}could be a second Lords. It will be a place of excitement and lots of things to do and see.{The Park}might have a few tennis courts. This could cause a few accidents so there might be a hospital in some of the spare fields that are not used much. There will probably be a{police station.}Harthill will not be a village if all this happens, it will be like a town.
